moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Odor Sleuth
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit with Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Gust
moves.description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Assurance
moves.description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

moves.name: Heart Stamp
moves.description: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the target less wary. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Imprison
moves.description: If the opponents know any move also known by the user, the opponents are prevented from using it.

moves.name: Air Cutter
moves.description: The user launches razor-like wind to slash the opposing team. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Attract
moves.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

moves.name: Amnesia
moves.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Calm Mind
moves.description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Air Slash
moves.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Future Sight
moves.description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Endeavor
moves.description: An attack move that cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP.
